name: Save new finished Chatra conversations in a Google spreadsheet row
description: Every time you finished your conversation in Chatra, Make will automatically add selected data to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses [this example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Psl1VRrCtcgLQEDXZxJ2XE2aCwMnFUyzvBWf5u-eR3c/edit?usp=sharing)
